column5: Had a couple of free hours while the sun shone so out to the river to meet my buddy the Smerch, and pitch for smallies.  Anna was out of hospital for a day of fresh air so she was camera girl. Action shots of Smerch.    My small contribution to the morning.  Sure beats sitting at home all day. Would have liked to stay longer, but Anna was getting tired and needed to lie down.
Great report and pics Bruce I'd say... that's a real good way of spending a couple of hours!!! Great job you guys and thanks sharing Jacques
looks like a great outing, thanks for sharing!
Nothing wrong with those 2 hrs. Bruce, thanks for sharing.
